languages.text: {n}Ветеран лишь мрачно качает головой.{/n} "Виноват, Ваша Светлость. Мутации у еретиков часто встречаются... Видно и правда дело с культом имеем".
{n}Klein shakes his head morosely.{/n} "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Mutations are common among heretics... I guess this really is about a cult."
languages.original_text: {n}Ветеран лишь мрачно качает головой.{/n} "Виноват, Ваша Светлость. Мутации у еретиков часто встречаются... Видно и правда дело с культом имеем".

languages.text: {n}Klein secoue la tête d'un air contrit.{/n} « Au temps pour moi, Votre Seigneurie. Les mutations sont monnaie courante, parmi les hérétiques... Il faut croire que nous avons affaire à une secte quelconque. »
languages.original_text: {n}Klein shakes his head morosely.{/n} "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Mutations are common among heretics... I guess this really is about a cult."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein secoue la tête d'un air contrit.{/n} « Au temps pour moi, Votre Seigneurie. Les mutations sont monnaie courante, parmi les hérétiques... Il faut croire que nous avons affaire à une secte quelconque. »

languages.text: {n}Klein menea la cabeza, taciturno.{/n} «Error mío, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Las mutaciones son comunes entre herejes... supongo que sí, hay un culto de por medio».
languages.original_text: {n}Klein shakes his head morosely.{/n} "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Mutations are common among heretics... I guess this really is about a cult."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein menea la cabeza, taciturno.{/n} «Error mío, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Las mutaciones son comunes entre herejes... supongo que sí, hay un culto de por medio».

languages.text: {n}克莱因痛苦地摇了摇头。{/n}“是我弄错了，大人。变异在异端分子之中也很常见……看来这一切真的和邪教有关。”
languages.original_text: {n}Klein shakes his head morosely.{/n} "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Mutations are common among heretics... I guess this really is about a cult."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因痛苦地摇了摇头。{/n}“是我弄错了，大人。变异在异端分子之中也很常见……看来这一切真的和邪教有关。”

languages.text: {n}クラインは頭を振った。{/n}「私の間違いでした、陛下。異変は異端にはよくあること…これは確かに、魔女団に関連していると思います」
languages.original_text: {n}Klein shakes his head morosely.{/n} "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Mutations are common among heretics... I guess this really is about a cult."

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインは頭を振った。{/n}「私の間違いでした、陛下。異変は異端にはよくあること…これは確かに、魔女団に関連していると思います」

languages.text: {n}Klein schüttelt trübsinnig den Kopf.{/n} "Mein Fehler, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Mutationen treten bei Ketzern häufig auf ... Es geht wohl wirklich um einen Kult."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein shakes his head morosely.{/n} "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Mutations are common among heretics... I guess this really is about a cult."

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein schüttelt trübsinnig den Kopf.{/n} "Mein Fehler, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Mutationen treten bei Ketzern häufig auf ... Es geht wohl wirklich um einen Kult."

languages.text: {n}Klein, suratsızca kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Benim hatam {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Kâfirler arasında mutasyona sık rastlanır... Sanırsam yaşananlar hakikaten bir tarikatla alakalı."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein shakes his head morosely.{/n} "My mistake, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Mutations are common among heretics... I guess this really is about a cult."
